entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
